description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `concreteSku` in method `Spryker\Zed\SalesQuantity\Dependency\Facade\SalesQuantityToProductFacadeBridge::getProductConcrete()`.
Bridges: Method `getProductConcrete()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
